review_text: The Sycamore House is located in a very quiet neighborhood. We enjoy taking walks - and the surrounding roads were quiet and flat. The house is also located very close to the amenities of Shelbyville - restaurants, groceries, shopping, Walmart, and the Celebration Walking Horse facilities. It is about 30 minutes to Murfreesboro, and another 30 minutes to Nashville. The house has 2 large common rooms, a dining room, and a kitchen (with a peninsula and 4 high top chairs) in the center of the house. Toward the back is a large sunroom, complete with a fireplace and an attached bathroom with sink/toilet/shower stall. To the left side of the house is the garage (we did not use it) and 2 bedrooms - sharing a bathroom that had a double sink, a tub/shower AND a separate shower stall. To the right side of the house is the master bedroom with a changing area - including a sink and counter space; a separate sink/toilet/tub-shower; and also a large closet. The house is very well maintained, with a rustic retro-70s look and feel. Appliances are older - but worked just fine. The wifi worked great, and the 2 TVs had Roku (which we found challenging at first, but we figured it out!)... During our visit, both the heat and the air conditioning worked fine. We would highly recommend the Sycamore House - and would stay there again!
